channel.title: High Alchemy!
channel.description:
1. How can I make my High Alch take me back to the magic book interface once I've cast the spell.
2. How can I get the correct graphics for high alchemy? I've got the glow, just it's either too slow or too low.
3. How can I make the graphics face the right way when I'm alching. It always faces south.

item.title: High Alchemy!
item.dc:creator: @lool121 lool121
item.description:
@lool121 wrote:

  1. Add This Into ur high alch.
setSidebarMage();

Got Errors?
Declare This Under: Runnable {

private void setSidebarMage() { try { outStream.createFrame(106); outStream.writeByteC(6); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } catch(Exception E) { sendMessage("Error switching sidebar back to the magic interface!"); } }

  1. I don’t know shure… This is a part of my High Alch.

actionTimer = 2; setAnimation(713); gfxhalfway(113, absY, absX); setSidebarMage(); addItem(995, alchvaluez); addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[6]), 6); resetanim = 12;

Graphix: gfxhalfway(113, absY, absX);
I did’nt figured the last question out, sorry.

- lool121.

Read full topic
